ai_analysis.selection_reasoning: Selected entry where account name contains 'Cash' and 'Custody' and '(USD)', and legal entity matches exactly. Other entries did not meet both account and currency criteria.
ai_analysis.excluded_entries: All other entries either did not contain both 'Cash' and 'Custody' or '(USD)' in the account name.

date_validation_details.discovery_process: Identified sheet-level header column named '2025-09-30 00:00:00', matching requested quarter_end_date pattern.
date_validation_details.extraction_method: Used header name as date source and converted to YYYY-MM-DD.
date_validation_details.final_decision: Dates matched; using actual ending balance.
